comments.author: Jackl87
comments.body: Quote from: AllYourBitcoinRBelong2Us on February 24, 2023, 04:56:45 AMI have a good amount of btc that I'm very pleased with. I love btc. Are there any other coins you guys could recommend I buy next? (none of your comments count as financial advice)Well with your Bitcoins you already have the safest and most stable of all cryptocurrencies in your portfolio. I think it is fair to say that a x10 of Bitcoin is not as likely as a x10 of an altcoin simply because Bitcoin already made several x1000 so the space for another x10 is just pretty limited in my opinion. On the other hand Bitcoin is very stable for a crypto.So for your altcoin investment it depends on what you want to achieve with it. Do you also want to be relatively safe like with your Bitcoin? Then i would invest into big and already established projects like Ethereum, BNB, Cosmos and so on.If you want to gamble, then invest into small and new projects, but of course you need to be aware that, it is totally possible that you lose all of your money then.

comments.author: fuguebtc
comments.body: Quote from: AllYourBitcoinRBelong2Us on February 24, 2023, 04:56:45 AMI have a good amount of btc that I'm very pleased with. I love btc. Are there any other coins you guys could recommend I buy next? (none of your comments count as financial advice)For altcoins, if you want to limit risk, then invest in top altcoins, if you are a risk taker and willing to take risks, then try new projects, meme projects. They are quite risky but have a high potential for return, if you are looking for x10, x100 investments then new projects can fulfill that need for you. But in my opinion, you should invest in ETH and BNB, these are 2 altcoins that will also give very good returns in the next bull season, if not more profitable than bitcoin.

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: Quote from: AllYourBitcoinRBelong2Us on February 24, 2023, 04:56:45 AMI have a good amount of btc that I'm very pleased with. I love btc. Are there any other coins you guys could recommend I buy next? (none of your comments count as financial advice)There is no need to buy other coins besides BTC if you don't have any information or don't know how to find other coins you can invest in. Just hold on to BTC and you'll be fine.If you want to invest in other coins, you have to painstakingly analyze each coin, determine the purchase price you want, and hold it until the price increases. And it's not easy to do, especially if you buy the coins based on suggestions from other people. I can only suggest looking at the list of the top 25 coins and analyzing them one by one to find the coin you want. Don't just listen to other people's advice because it is your money, you have to be responsible with your money.
